name: Sea Salty and Pepper Potato Chips
author: Buggzy
summary: Snappy, mouth-watering, and addictive, these chips are quick and easy to make. They taste awesome with a cheeseburger or just as a snack on a break at work. These chips are amazing!
directions: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir water and 2 tablespoons sea salt together in a bowl until salt is dissolved
Transfer 2 handfuls of potatoes using tongs from water to hot oil, cover the pot or fryer, and cook in hot oil until chips are crispy and light brown, 5 to 7 minutes
Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate
Place chips in a large bowl and sprinkle remaining salt and pepper over the top; toss to coat
